text: CLOSE'Brooklyn Nine - Nine'star Terry Crews has filed an assault and battery lawsuit against WME and agent Adam Venit, who Crews claims violated him at a party in Hollywood in 2016. USA TODAY Terry Crews poses for a photo during his visit to SiriusXM Studios on Sept. 29, 2017, in New York City. ( Photo : Mike Coppola, Getty Images ) Terry Crews is suing the Hollywood agent he accused of groping him last year at an industry event. After filing a complaint with the LAPD last month, Crews has launched a lawsuit against William Morris Endeavor agent Adam Venit for assault, battery and sexual harassment, among other charges.
